tool_description: Analyzes table structures for normalization forms (1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF) and identifies normalization violations with recommended corrections.

table_structures.description: Table definitions with columns in format 'table:column1,column2,...'

allow_denormalization.description: Whether to allow strategic denormalization for performance

preserve_existing_structure.description: Whether to preserve existing table structure where possible

error_messages: Invalid table structure format: Use format 'table_name:column1,column2,...' for table definitions.
Invalid dependency format: Use format 'table:column1->column2' for functional dependencies.
Unsupported normal form: Use one of [1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF] as target_normal_form.
Empty table structures: Provide at least one table structure for analysis.
usage: Provide table_structures and functional_dependencies arrays. Optionally set target_normal_form, allow_denormalization, and preserve_existing_structure. Returns normalization analysis and recommendations.

current_normal_forms.description: Current normalization level for each table

normalization_violations.description: Identified normalization violations and their descriptions

recommended_changes.description: Specific recommendations to achieve target normalization

new_tables_needed.description: New tables needed to resolve normalization issues
